document_data.mainbody:
Crests, Flags, and Banners of the Moonsea was a book on the topic of heraldry of the Moonsea region, penned by Her Ladyship Salanida Lenafae of Ordulin sometime before the late 14 century DR.
A copy of Crests, Flags, and Banners of the Moonsea belonged to Manshoon XII, a clone of Manshoon, in the . The book was stored in the mages library of mundane and arcane tomes in his lair in an abandoned temple of Amaunator underneath the City of the Dead of Waterdeep.
